# The `ARMPreAllocLoadStoreOpt` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Pre- register allocation pass that move load / stores from consecutive locations close to make it more likely they will be combined later. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct anonymous_namespace{ARMLoadStoreOptimizer.cpp}::ARMPreAllocLoadStoreOpt</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Pre- register allocation pass that move load / stores from consecutive locations close to make it more likely they will be combined later.

Definition at line 2140 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armloadstoreoptimizer-cpp">ARMLoadStoreOptimizer.cpp</a>.

getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.
